page.title: 17CLUBS IN KIRKSTEAD
page.content: {CLUBS IN KIRKSTEAD AREA} A Womans Institute was formed in the village of Martin Dales in 1961.W.Spa W.I. meets at St Peters Church Hall. There was a fishing club,reformed in 1970,which is known as Kirkstead Angling Club.There is a Darby and Joan Club in W.Spa for the elderly.In 1929 the W.Spa branch of the British Legion began,and is still greatly supported in the region.The Youth Club meets in Coronation Hall W.Spa.The hall is used for many activites including Age Concern Club and Carpet Bowls.The Conservatives Club in W.Spa is very active.There is also a Gardening Club & Flower Arranging Group in Woodhall. To celebrate their 21st anniversary Martin Dales W.I. members decided to promote an over 60's club,the Good Companions Club being formed in 1982. The Golf Club has many gatherings.
